articles.title: ‘It’s a joke’: David Pastrnak, Bruins vent after controversial OT call in Stadium Series
articles.description:
"It’s weird. Score a goal and end up in the penalty box. Whatever."

The post ‘It’s a joke’: David Pastrnak, Bruins vent after controversial OT call in Stadium Series appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: David Pastrnak criticized a controversial penalty call during the Bruins' Stadium Series overtime.
The call occurred after Pastrnak scored, leading to frustration among Bruins players.
Local fans express disappointment over officiating affecting the outcome of the game.

articles.title: 11 takeaways from Bruins’ wild shootout loss to Lightning in Stadium Series
articles.description:
“The way that we lost it is just brutal, spending half the game in the penalty box.”

The post 11 takeaways from Bruins’ wild shootout loss to Lightning in Stadium Series appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins lost 5-4 in a shootout against the Lightning on February 2.
Team spent over 30 minutes in the penalty box, affecting game strategy.
Local fans express frustration over inconsistent officiating impacting Bruins' performance.

articles.title: Former dairy farm in Dartmouth converted to $2M luxury home
articles.description:
The 7,891-square-foot house retains the architectural footprint of its dairy farming past.

The post Former dairy farm in Dartmouth converted to $2M luxury home appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dartmouth's former Gulf Hill dairy farm transformed into a $2M luxury home.
The new home spans 7,891 square feet, preserving its agricultural architecture.
Local real estate market may see increased property values due to luxury developments.
